law.catch_line: Statutory provisions not superseded by KRS 15.380 to 15.404.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 17, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 21, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 132, sec. 7, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 108, effective December 1, 1998.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/2002). The Reviser of Statutes has renumbered the subsections of this statute under the authority of KRS 7.136(1)(a).
